com.acrolinx.javasdk.api.factory

Interface AcrolinxClient


  • public interface AcrolinxClient
    The AcrolinxClient encapsulates all root client side functionality. It is used to look up and connect the Acrolinx Server lookupServer(ServerEndpointConfiguration).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static AcrolinxClient NULL
      A null client.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ServerConnection connect(ConnectionSettings connectionSettings)
      Connects to an Acrolinx Server.
      AcrolinxFactory getAcrolinxFactory() 
      ClientInformation getClientInformation() 
      ApplicationStore getStore() 
      ServerEndpoint lookupServer(ServerEndpointConfiguration serverEndpointConfiguration)
      Creates a new ServerEndpoint.

    • Field Detail

      • NULL

        static final AcrolinxClient NULL
        A null client.

    • Method Detail

      • getAcrolinxFactory

        AcrolinxFactory getAcrolinxFactory()
        Returns:
        The AcrolinxFactory used to create this AcrolinxClient.

        ApplicationStore getStore()
        Returns:
        The ApplicationStore used to save settings like

      • lookupServer

        ServerEndpoint lookupServer(ServerEndpointConfiguration serverEndpointConfiguration)
        Creates a new ServerEndpoint.
        Parameters:
        serverEndpointConfiguration - the server endpoint configuration
        Returns:
        the server endpoint

      • connect

        ServerConnection connect(ConnectionSettings connectionSettings)
        Connects to an Acrolinx Server. This method is a shortcut for lookupServer(ServerEndpointConfiguration) and ServerEndpoint.connect(com.acrolinx.javasdk.api.server.User).
        Parameters:
        connectionSettings - The ConnectionSettings to establish the ServerConnection.
        Returns:
        The ServerConnection with specified settings.
